title: AI-Driven OER Sustainability Design: Social Sector-Tailored Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of Open Educational Resources (OER) concepts
context.additional_context: Designed for smartphone-centric accessibility and low-cost AI tools, incorporating gamification elements to promote learner engagement.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five sustainability dimensions of OER (social, economic, environmental, pedagogical, and technological) to practical cases.
Learners can produce multilingual OER content over 50% faster using AI-based translation tools.
Learners can create and distribute mobile-optimized OER materials in an LMS environment while complying with accessibility standards by over 80%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
